product_name: CamelBak Molokai Paddling Hydration Pack - 70 fl. oz.
long_description: Quick access to front cargo pockets and 70 fl. oz. of hands-free hydration make the CamelBak MolokaiTM Hydration Pack ideal for enjoying long distances on your stand up paddleboard.
short_description: Quick access to front cargo pockets and 70 fl. oz. of hands-free hydration make the CamelBak MolokaiTM Hydration Pack ideal for enjoying long distances on your stand up paddleboard.
